data.text:
@jucopel Hi Jude,

Can you please send us your email address, mobile number and more information about your query, so we can assist you further.
@UberUKsupport Thanks, but it was the Jude who wrote the first tweet on this thread who had the Uber driver, so you’ll need to contact her. Thank you.

@Fran36826150 Hi Fran,

Can you please send us your email address, mobile number and more information about your query, so we can assist you further.

@SaraONeillArt @jucopel @UberUK The Executive needs to do adverts and interviews stressing that it is STILL STRONG GUIDANCE that masks be worn, as that message clearly isn’t getting out there. I know of a young child in I.C.U. with Covid and of someone who recently died of it in a care home. #CovidIsNotOver

@jucopel Hi Jude,

Can you please send us your email address, mobile number and trip details in a DM, so we can assist you further.

@jucopel @UberUK It amazes me that people were called sheeple because they happened to wear a mask when it was guidance. Now it’s no longer guidance, but many continue to wear masks.. almost as if it’s always been a free & conscious decision & FA to do with the government…
